posts.title: Agentic AI Is the #1 Cybersecurity Threat in 2026. Here's How It Maps to Your Security+ Exam.
posts.author: FixTheVuln Team
posts.excerpt: Agentic AI represents an unprecedented cybersecurity threat in 2026. Learn how autonomous AI agents create new attack vectors and how these threats map directly to Security+ SY0-701 exam domains.
